name: pestilentia
description:
This was a Compo game for Ludum Dare 46. https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/pestilentia

Keep it alive! Save the world, and don't let the plague terminate all life. Protect the healthy people from infected people, rats, and other filth. 8 levels of scaling difficulty.

Directions:
Use Mouse Click and Drag to play the game.
People and Wood Barriers can be moved around.
